sqlMap.statement: SELECT PV.PRNT_VND_CD ,PV.PRNT_VND_NM ,PV.TAX_PAYER_ID ,PVT.ARCS_VND_TP_LKUP_TXT ,VND.VND_PK ,VND.VND_CD ,VND.LOC_NM ,VND.EFF_FROM_DT ,VND.CTRY_CD ,VND.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,VND.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,VND.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,VND.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,VND.CTY_ADDR ,VND.ST_CD ,VND.POST_CD ,NVL(SPLY_SITE.ARCS_PAY_GRP_LKUP_TXT,SPLY.ARCS_PAY_GRP_LKUP_TXT) AS ARCS_PAY_GRP_LKUP_TXT FROM PRNT_VND_TP PVT ,PRNT_VND PV ,VND VND ,PAY_GRP SPLY ,PAY_GRP SPLY_SITE WHERE PVT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND PVT.SEND_ARCS_FLG = #PVT_SEND_ARCS_FLG# AND PVT.ARCS_VND_TP_LKUP_TXT IS NOT NULL AND PVT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PVT.PRNT_VND_TP_CD = PV.PRNT_VND_TP_CD AND PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VND.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PV.PRNT_VND_PK = VND.PRNT_VND_PK AND PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SPLY.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PV.PAY_GRP_CD = SPLY.PAY_GRP_CD(+) AND VND.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SPLY_SITE.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND VND.PAY_GRP_CD = SPLY_SITE.PAY_GRP_CD(+) AND VND.SEND_ARCS_FLG = #DV_SEND_ARCS_FLG# AND PVT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND VND.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SPLY.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SPLY_SITE.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY PV.PRNT_VND_PK ,VND.VND_PK
